vulnerabilities.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
vulnerabilities.description: Missing security header: X-Content-Type-Options (MIME type sniffing protection)
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add X-Content-Type-Options header to improve security

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Strict-Transport-Security Header
vulnerabilities.description: Missing security header: Strict-Transport-Security (HTTPS enforcement)
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add Strict-Transport-Security header to improve security

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy Header
vulnerabilities.description: Missing security header: Content-Security-Policy (Content injection protection)
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add Content-Security-Policy header to improve security

vulnerabilities.title: Missing X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies Header
vulnerabilities.description: Missing security header: X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies (Cross-domain policy control)
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header to improve security

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Referrer-Policy Header
vulnerabilities.description: Missing security header: Referrer-Policy (Referrer information control)
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add Referrer-Policy header to improve security

vulnerabilities.title: Weak SSL Protocol Supported
vulnerabilities.description: Server supports weak PROTOCOL_TLSv1 protocol
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Disable weak SSL/TLS protocols and use TLS 1.2+ only

vulnerabilities.title: Robots.txt File Exposed
vulnerabilities.description: robots.txt file reveals directory structure
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Review robots.txt for sensitive path disclosure
